Detailed Description

Class RamDataSource implements a data source which reads from an associated RamDataSink instance.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RamDataSource::RamDataSource (  const RamDataSinkPtr &  sink  ) 
 

Creates a RAM data source instance. This data source reads from an internally controlled temporary RAM file. The file data source has to be opened using method Open() before reading from it. On destruction, the RAM data source will be closed if not explicitly done before.

Parameters:
sink The RAM data sink to read from.

RamDataSource::~RamDataSource (   )  [virtual]
 

Destroys the RAM data source.
